short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Legislation.mt PDFs in new window via the extension button or ALT+P.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A small tool to help users of legislation.mt to not have to wait for the pdf plugin to load to print. Clicking on the plugin or using ALT+P will open the PDF in a new window and the browser PDF viewer will be used.

Code is open source and can be found here: https://github.com/CHAKOTAY99/legislationMTplugin
